titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that defense appropriations bills should be considered only as stand-alone measures.
Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that defense appropriations bills should be considered only as stand-alone measures.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that defense appropriations bills should be considered in the House only as standalone measures.
